text: 34|9|Sihamtaka agaphalara paraa arau pichaphalara paraa agurai rakha akasara prati arau prthiraira prati sihamte laksya karaa na'ine? Ami iccha karaile sihamtaka matisaha puti diba parao athaba sihamtara oparata akasara paraa eta tukuraa pelaba parao. Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, pratyeka allaha abhimukhi bandara babe.
